mapper.insert: insert into certification(ce_me_id, ce_certification_number, ce_time) values(#{mok.ce_me_id},#{mok.ce_certification_number}, date_add(#{mok.ce_time},interval 1 hour))

insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_email, me_phone, me_birth, me_post_num, me_road_name, me_detail_address) values(#{m.me_id},#{m.me_pw},#{m.me_name},#{m.me_email},#{m.me_phone},#{m.me_birth},#{m.me_post_num},#{m.me_road_name},#{m.me_detail_address})
mapper.delete: delete from certification where ce_me_id = #{mok.ce_me_id} and ce_certification_number = #{mok.ce_certification_number}
mapper.insert: insert into board_list (bl_me_id, bl_post_num, bl_road_name, bl_detail_address) select ce_me_id, me_post_num, me_road_name, me_detail_address from certification join member on ce_me_id = me_id where ce_me_id = #{ce_me_id}
mapper.update: update member set me_join_time = now() where me_id = #{me_id}
mapper.select: select * from board_list where bl_me_id = #{me_id} order by bl_num asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(*) from board_list where bl_me_id = #{me_id}
